title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Emerald Accents & Pearl Drops
materials: Freshwater Pearls (South Sea Pearls). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Exquisite Lakshmi Kasula design with detailed Nakshi work depicting Goddess Lakshmi at the center, flanked by temple-style jhumka elements. Intricate filigree detailing and peacock motifs embellished with CZ diamonds. Emerald tear drops punctuate the design. Adorned with freshwater pearl drops, adding a touch of sophistication. Includes adjustable Dori (cord) for comfortable wearing length.
description: A timeless piece of South Indian heritage, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship. The Lakshmi motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious addition to any jewelry collection. Durable 22K gold ensures longevity, while the Hyderabadi polish guarantees a brilliant shine that lasts for generations. A perfect blend of traditional and contemporary design elements.
